item.title: Here be Screenies
item.description:
Upload screenshots here. funny, leet, boring, random etc shots of ur experience in Myth War. creativity is applauded and i will +karma the good ones.
here is me with my gw team in the very last gw i participated in. all 5 clients hang at the end
